name: Mochi Summer
description:
Description

The summer holidays are here! You and your mochi friends are invited to your relative's place to have some fun. How will you guys spend it?

Features

  • Four Cute Mochi to Choose From
  • Three Locations, Three Minigames
  • Tap Tap Tap as Fast as You Can!
  • Compete Against Your Friends
  • Bright and Cute 2d Art Style With Anime Influences 

Developed and created by a Media Design School student
